meta.title: Golden Sweet | Dietary Pastry in Tetouan & Tangier
meta.description: Golden Sweet creates artisan plant-based cinnamon rolls and pastries in Tetouan & Tangier. Order your 100% homemade treats, available 24/7.

promo.banner: FOR A LIMITED TIME ¬∑ FREE DELIVERY TO TANGIER FROM 500 DHs

home.hero_kicker: 100% healthy, for safety & peace of mind
home.hero_desc: 100% healthy, made to guarantee safety and peace of mind, so you can enjoy every moment of indulgence without a second thought.
home.hero_typing_initial: All the pleasure, without the regret
hero_typing_words: All the pleasure, without the regret
All the pleasure, with all the safety
All the pleasure, with peace of mind
home.hero_testimonial: Your pistachio rolls light up our team evenings!
home.value1_desc: Crafted for your safety and peace of mind, using carefully selected natural ingredients.
home.value2_desc: Freshly prepared every day to ensure quality, safety, and consistent flavor.
home.value3_desc: Our flavors follow Moroccan harvests: Azemmour pistachios, Souss amlou, locally roasted coffee.
home.value4_desc: Built on honesty and responsibility, with clear sourcing and support for the local community.
home.story_heading: Born from awareness, dedicated to well-being
home.story_intro: Golden Sweet was founded in 2019, during the COVID-19 pandemic, when health and immunity became global priorities. This moment shaped our vision: indulgence should never come at the expense of well-being. From day one, we chose to create 100% natural, sugar-free pastries designed to be safe, balanced, and bring true peace of mind.
home.timeline_2019_desc: Complete removal of refined sugar and harmful ingredients, replaced with natural oils such as argan, olive, and coconut, and flours including barley, almond, and corn.
home.timeline_2021_desc: Continuous refinement of taste and texture, alongside strict standards for ingredient sourcing, preparation, and food safety.
home.timeline_2023_desc: Expansion of production and menu offerings while preserving freshness, safety, and our sugar-free, natural philosophy.
home.timeline_2026_desc: Expansion through franchising, bringing the Golden Sweet experience to new cities while maintaining the same quality, recipes, and standards worldwide.
home.provenance_desc: Golden Sweet is made exclusively in Tetouan with 100% natural ingredients. To protect freshness, safety, and quality, delivery is limited to Tangier.
home.provenance_solution_desc: Franchising, bringing Golden Sweet locally to the world.
home.hero_title: Artisan treats, day and night in Tetouan & Tangier
home.hero_description: Our soft rolls, golden cannel√©s and creamy drinks are handcrafted and delivered warm, even at 3 AM.
home.value1_desc_alt: Organic flours, raw sugars and plant-based butters create recipes that are as delicious as they are responsible.
home.value2_desc_alt: Kneaded, rolled and glazed by hand, our products come fresh from the oven multiple times a day.
home.value3_desc_alt: Our flavors follow Moroccan harvests: Azemmour pistachios, Souss amlou, locally roasted coffee.
home.value4_desc_alt: Quality, traceability and support for local artisans: every roll funds community initiatives.
home.story_heading_alt: From family kitchen to the north's favorite sweet spot
home.story_intro_alt: Chef Aziza created Golden Sweet to offer 100% plant-based cinnamon rolls to loved ones. Orders multiplied quickly, then night deliveries, until we opened our workshop in Tetouan.
home.timeline_2019_desc_alt: One box, six soft rolls and word-of-mouth that spread across Tetouan in weeks.
home.timeline_2021_desc_alt: Installation of our plant-based lab and launch of pistachio, amlou and Moroccan coffee flavors.
home.timeline_2022_desc: 24/7 production to satisfy hotels, caf√©s and late-night neighbors.
home.timeline_2024_desc: Arrival of cannel√©s, past√©is de nata and colorful lattes to complement our iconic rolls.
home.provenance_desc_alt: Every roll starts with responsible sourcing. We select our nuts, coffees and aromatic plants from producers who share our plant-based vision.
home.chef_heading: Meet Chef Aziza, creator of Golden Sweet rolls
home.chef_desc: Self-taught and passionate, Chef Aziza reimagines childhood pastries in plant-based versions. She works soft textures, pistachio, amlou and Moroccan coffee flavors for generous rolls.
home.chef_technique: Signature technique: slow dough rise for incomparable softness.
home.chef_ingredient: Signature ingredient: homemade amlou with vegan honey, roasted weekly.
home.chef_commitment: Commitment: training young pastry chefs in plant-based recipes.
home.events_form_note: Two emails per month, recipes and zero spam.
home.press_heading: They've tasted and approved our rolls
home.newsletter_heading: Receive our seasonal menus and night offers
home.catalog_desc: Turn the pages to discover our artisan story, crafted for those who refuse to compromise
home.catalog_page1_lead: We believe that true pleasure comes from purity.
home.catalog_page1_text: Since 2019, Golden Sweet has been crafting a new standard for pastry‚Äîwhere health and delight are inseparable.
home.catalog_page2_promise1_desc: Sweetened only with nature's finest ingredients.
home.catalog_page2_promise2_desc: Baked fresh every morning for peak flavor.
home.catalog_page2_promise3_desc: Strict hygiene standards for your peace of mind.
home.catalog_page3_text1: We carefully select high-quality argan oil, chosen for its purity and nutritional value in Essaouira.
home.catalog_page3_text2: Rich in antioxidants, it brings a nutty depth to our signature rolls that butter simply cannot match.
home.catalog_page4_lead: Patience is our most important ingredient.
home.catalog_page4_text: Our dough is given time to rest before baking. This slow fermentation allows flavors to fully develop and results in pastries that are lighter, more balanced, and easier to digest.
home.catalog_page7_note: All rolls are 100% healthy & safe for all.
home.catalog_pairing1_desc: Balances the sweetness of the Classic Roll.
home.catalog_pairing2_desc: Intense notes to complement Chocolate Hazelnut.
home.catalog_pairing3_desc: Creamy finish for the Pistachio Roll.
home.catalog_page9_desc: Coming soon: A collection inspired by the orchards of Tetouan.
home.catalog_page10_desc: The perfect gift. A curated selection of our finest rolls.
home.catalog_page12_desc: Make an impression with the taste of pure wellness. Perfect for corporate clients or wedding favors.
home.catalog_gift1_desc: Your logo on our elegant boxes.
home.catalog_page13_desc: We believe in kindness to the earth as much as kindness to our bodies.
home.catalog_sustain2_desc: Minimizing carbon footprint by buying local.
home.catalog_service3_desc: Learn the art of healthy baking.
home.catalog_testimonial1_text: The most elegant pastry experience in Morocco.
home.catalog_testimonial2_text: Finally, guilt-free indulgence that actually tastes incredible.
home.catalog_page16_text: Every roll we bake is a promise kept‚Äîa promise that you don't have to choose between your health and your happiness. Welcome to our family.
home.catalog_page17_desc: Bring the Golden Sweet experience to your city.
home.testimonial_1_text: Delicious and healthy pastries ‚Äî thank you, Chef, for the quality and the service üëèüèºüëèüèºüëèüèº
home.testimonial_2_text: A bakery specialized in healthy products, with no wheat and no sugar.
home.community_gallery_1_note: Delivery is available to the city of #tangier
home.community_gallery_2_alt: Healthy Dubai chocolate without gluten and sugar
home.community_gallery_2_note: Healthy Dubai chocolate without gluten and sugar.
home.product_classic_desc: Our signature roll with Ceylon cinnamon and creamy vanilla glaze.
home.product_choco_desc: Belgian dark chocolate melted on fluffy dough, topped with roasted hazelnuts.
home.product_caramel_desc: Salted caramel and crunchy pecans on a golden cinnamon base.
home.product_pistachio_desc: Homemade pistachio cream, roasted almonds and matcha glaze for a fresh touch.
home.product_pasteis_desc: Vanilla cream, crispy puff pastry and caramelized muscovado sugar.
home.product_canneles_desc: Soft vanilla heart, caramelized shell and a touch of orange blossom.
home.bestsellers_heading: Sweet Treats That Return Every Night
home.product_box_desc: A shareable assortment of our iconic rolls: vanilla, caramel, chocolate, raspberry and pistachio.
home.product_raspberry_desc: Light vanilla cream, raspberry coulis and pink glaze on a soft roll.
home.product_mocha_desc: Mocha glaze with Gu√©liz coffee beans, blonde caramel and a touch of orange blossom.
home.community_desc: Every day, we share moments of guilt-free pleasure, healthy coffee breaks, fresh pastries, and simple joys made with confidence. Tag your moments and be part of the Golden Sweet story.
home.specials_party_desc: Choose a seasonal flavor, a botanical glaze, and we'll create a custom centerpiece.
home.specials_wholesale_desc: Our healthy products complement the offerings of cafes, hotels, and concept stores with 24/7 delivery.
home.cta_desc: 100% Healthy, sugar-free, gluten-free treats made fresh every day

lamaison.title: Our House | Golden Sweet
lamaison.hero_subtitle: From home kitchen to beloved pastry destination
lamaison.history_title: Born from awareness, dedicated to well-being
lamaison.history_text: Golden Sweet was founded in 2019, during the COVID-19 pandemic, when health and immunity became global priorities. This moment shaped our vision: indulgence should never come at the expense of well-being. From day one, we chose to create 100% natural, sugar-free pastries designed to be safe, balanced, and bring true peace of mind.
lamaison.timeline_2019_desc: From the very beginning, we made a clear choice to completely remove refined sugar and any ingredients that could negatively impact health. Our recipes were rebuilt using carefully selected natural oils such as argan, olive, and coconut, combined with alternative flours including barley, almond, and corn. The goal was simple: create pastries that are both enjoyable and genuinely better for the body.
lamaison.timeline_2021_desc: As the brand grew, our focus shifted to perfecting balance ‚Äî improving taste and texture without compromising our health-first philosophy. We introduced strict standards for ingredient sourcing, preparation methods, and food safety, ensuring consistency and reliability in every product, every day.
lamaison.timeline_2023_desc: Golden Sweet expanded its production capacity and menu offerings while remaining faithful to its core values. Each new product was developed with the same attention to freshness, safety, and sugar-free formulation, proving that growth can happen without sacrificing quality or integrity.
lamaison.timeline_2026_desc: Looking ahead, Golden Sweet‚Äôs ambition is to expand through franchising, allowing the brand to reach new cities and countries. By replicating our recipes, processes, and quality standards locally, we aim to offer the same safe, natural, and refined experience worldwide.
lamaison.value1_desc: Crafted for your safety and peace of mind, using carefully selected natural ingredients.
lamaison.value2_desc: Freshly prepared every day to ensure quality, safety, and consistent flavor.
lamaison.value3_desc: Our flavors follow Moroccan harvests: pistachios from Azemmour, amlou from Souss, coffee from trusted local roasters.
lamaison.value4_desc: Built on honesty and responsibility, with clear sourcing and support for the local community.
lamaison.vision_desc: We believe indulgence and well-being should go hand in hand. At Golden Sweet, we craft sugar-free, health-focused pastries without compromising taste, quality, or pleasure. Our vision is to grow across the world while staying true to our core values: clean ingredients, consistent quality, and trust. By refining our recipes and processes, we aim to make better pastry the new standard‚Äîaccessible, reliable, and genuinely healthier.

franchising.hero_desc: Bring healthy, dietary-friendly pastries to your community. Partner with us to open a Golden Sweet franchise and share the joy of guilt-free indulgence worldwide.
franchising.benefit1_desc: Leverage our established reputation for premium, healthy pastries. Join a movement that's redefining indulgence across continents.
franchising.benefit2_desc: Our tested recipes, streamlined operations, and customer loyalty strategies ensure you start with a winning formula.
franchising.benefit3_desc: From training to marketing, we provide end-to-end support to help you thrive. You're never alone on this journey.
franchising.benefit4_desc: Tap into the growing market for vegan and health-conscious consumers. Our unique positioning sets you apart from competitors.
franchising.benefit5_desc: With low overhead, premium pricing, and loyal customers, our franchise model delivers strong profit margins and sustainable growth.
franchising.benefit6_desc: Whether it's a cozy caf√©, mall kiosk, or cloud kitchen, we adapt our model to fit your market and investment capacity.
franchising.investment_subtitle: Transparent requirements for becoming a Golden Sweet franchise partner
franchising.inv_initial_desc: Includes equipment, training, site preparation, and initial inventory
franchising.inv_space_desc: Flexible options from kiosks to full caf√©s depending on your market
franchising.inv_royalty_desc: Ongoing support, marketing materials, social media agency and brand development included
franchising.inv_values_desc: Commitment to all the values and principles of the brand, in accordance with the conditions outlined in the operations manual
franchising.step1_desc: Fill out our franchise application form and tell us about your background, location preferences, and vision.
franchising.step2_desc: Meet our expansion team for an in-depth conversation about the opportunity, expectations, and mutual fit.
franchising.step3_desc: We help you identify the perfect location based on foot traffic, demographics, and market potential.
franchising.step4_desc: Up to 4-months training covering recipes, operations, customer service, and brand standards.
franchising.step5_desc: Launch with our support team on-site, marketing campaigns ready, and a community eager to taste Golden Sweet.
franchising.sup1_desc: Comprehensive guides covering every aspect of running your Golden Sweet location, from daily checklists to quality standards.
franchising.sup2_desc: Access our library of recipe tutorials, equipment handling, and customer experience training anytime, anywhere.
franchising.sup3_desc: Ready-to-use social media templates, print materials, local campaign strategies, and seasonal promotion calendars.
franchising.sup4_desc: Direct access to our franchise support team for operational questions, troubleshooting, and strategic guidance.
franchising.sup5_desc: Regular visits from our team to ensure brand standards, provide feedback, and identify growth opportunities.
franchising.sup6_desc: Connect with fellow franchise partners to share experiences, best practices, and build a supportive community.
franchising.faq1_q: Do I need restaurant experience to become a franchisee?
franchising.faq1_a: While prior food service experience is helpful, it's not required. We provide comprehensive training that covers all aspects of operations. What we look for is passion for the brand, business acumen, and commitment to delivering excellent customer experiences.
franchising.faq2_a: We're actively expanding across the Middle East, Europe and the United States. Prime territories in major cities are available. We also consider applications from other regions on a case-by-case basis. Contact us to discuss specific locations.
franchising.faq3_q: How long does the training program last?
franchising.faq3_a: Our comprehensive training program can last up to four months. This includes a set period of training at our Tetouan location, as well as on-site support at your location during the pre-opening phase.
franchising.faq4_q: Can I own multiple franchise locations?
franchising.faq4_a: Absolutely! We offer multi-unit development agreements for qualified partners. After successfully operating your first location, you can discuss expansion plans with our development team.
franchising.faq5_q: What ongoing fees should I expect?
franchising.faq5_a: Our franchise model includes a 5% royalty fee on gross sales and a 2% social media agency fee. These fees support ongoing assistance, brand development, national marketing campaigns, and the continuous improvement of our systems and recipes.
franchising.cta_heading: Ready to Bring Golden Sweet to Your City?
franchising.cta_desc: Take the first step towards owning a franchise that delivers joy, health, and community connection.
